## MemoizeOptionsFromParameters type

Extracts the options type for a memoization function based on its parameters. The first parameter of the function is expected to be the function to be memoized, followed by options for the memoization process.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MemoizeOptionsFromParameters<MemoizeFunction extends UnknownMemoizer> = (NonFunctionType<DropFirstParameter<MemoizeFunction>[0]> | FunctionType<DropFirstParameter<MemoizeFunction>[0]>) | (NonFunctionType<DropFirstParameter<MemoizeFunction>[number]> | FunctionType<DropFirstParameter<MemoizeFunction>[number]>)[];
```
**References:** [UnknownMemoizer](./reselect.unknownmemoizer.md)
